price: 11. Bakokitanelaka bisika ya likolo, na lola bakozalaka libela o kati na yango.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
